item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Founder Mode (410 points | 264 comments)
2. How a Leading Chain of Psychiatric Hospitals Traps Patients (95 points | 31 comments)
3. Show HN: Linkpreview, see how your sites looks in social media and chat apps (99 points | 41 comments)
4. Einstein's Other Theory of Everything (90 points | 30 comments)
5. Honey, I shrunk {fmt}: bringing binary size to 14k and ditching the C++ runtime (158 points | 62 comments)
6. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (743 points | 83 comments)
7. The web's clipboard, and how it stores data of different types (51 points | 4 comments)
8. Godot on iPad, Toolbars, Importers, Embedding, Debugger (79 points | 30 comments)
9. Playstation 2 GS emulation – the final frontier of Vulkan compute emulation (164 points | 41 comments)
10. Hypothyroidism: The anonymous Olmec artisan and Velázquez (2017) (18 points | 1 comment)
11. Amazon and Bezos fund's influence over carbon credit market raises alarm (12 points | 4 comments)
12. Harder Drive: hard drives we didn't want, or need (2022) [video] (379 points | 65 comments)
13. Build Your Own Z80 Computer: Design Guidelines and Application (1981) (62 points | 10 comments)
14. Anarchy in Sudan has spawned the world’s worst famine in 40 years (184 points | 230 comments)
15. Did your car witness a crime? (255 points | 525 comments)
16. A brief history of barbed wire fence telephone networks (98 points | 11 comments)
17. Making an atomic trampoline [video] (123 points | 52 comments)
18. MapRoulette: the micro-tasking tool for OpenStreetMap (79 points | 29 comments)
19. Percona Everest: open-source automated database provisioning and management (84 points | 36 comments)
20. Brazil's X ban is sending lots of people to Bluesky (347 points | 590 comments)
21. WatchYourLAN: Lightweight Network IP Scanner (166 points | 22 comments)
22. Astronomers puzzled by little red galaxies that seem impossibly dense (75 points | 50 comments)
23. Client-side QR code generator with SVG output (141 points | 27 comments)
24. The Null Pointer (73 points | 8 comments)
25. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
26. Show HN: A retro terminal text editor for GNU/Linux coded in C (C-edit) (158 points | 49 comments)
27. Show HN: Typeform alternative, turns Markdown to forms (173 points | 67 comments)
28. The Design and Implementation of the CPython Virtual Machine (46 points | 5 comments)
29. Epilepsy Protection for VRChat (36 points | 7 comments)
30. Non-Determinism and Overcount on Modern Hardware Performance Counters [pdf] (33 points | 2 comments)
